original_title: Walk Away the Pounds: 4 Mile Burn
overview: Celebrity fitness instructor Leslie Sansone is back with this super-charged walking routine.  Walk rain or shine in the comfort of your home and get in a fun and energizing workout that gets you results.  This 55-minute 4-mile walking workout will get your heart pumping to torch calories and blast fat.  Leslie guides you through a variety of side steps, knee lifts, arm curls and more for the ultimate full body workout.  Get a leaner, more sculpted look with this low-impact workout perfect for all fitness levels!
tagline: The easy, effective way to get started
title: Walk Away the Pounds: 4 Mile Burn
